StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Hands on PMP and senior executive professional, Director FP&A, Regional Controller and CFO with 25 years of financial services experience in financial services industry. Effective in business integration, strategic planning, regulatory approvals, implementing policies and procedures, redesign and reengineering of financial reporting and controls for financial products. Led organizational performance improvement (Change Management). Detailed oriented, prepared to lead and to join teams towards successful outcome under tight timelines and complex settings. Structured approach and efficient use of project management tools. Languages: fluent in English and in Spanish, conversant in Italian and in Portuguese. PMP certified, Lean Six Sigma Green Belt, PgMP Candidate.

PositionHistory.Title: Engagement Partner
PositionHistory.Description: CFO for Portfolio Company. Performed advisory services for new ventures. Lead PE practice business development.

PositionHistory.Title: Program Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Program Manager for (GCBM) Global Capital and Balance Sheet Group Managed Projects Portfolio from Charter development to project completion and delivery. Represented management driving new initiatives. Liaised with IT development teams for successful planning and implementation of strategic projects and tactical solutions. Completed GAP analysis, Prepared (BRD) Business Requirements Documents for projects. Documented OTC Derivatives Funding Process and Control. Summarized recommendations for process flow improvements. Completed Finance specs for IT's development of automated process solution. Planned and controlled General Ledger system migration. Maintained exception list in SQL RDMS. Scheduled UAT. Escalated issues. Maintained performance metrics. Monitored and reported on the status of projects life cycle KPI. Responsible for Basel 1, 2 &3 funding calculation capital reporting solution development. Coordinate execution of projects portfolio of initiatives and solutions resulting from the impact of the Basel & Dodd Frank regulatory requirement affecting corporate governance, compliance, and risk management. Designed and implemented process using SharePoint Three State (phase) workflows to rationalize add-hoc requests. Program Manager for Prime Brokerage. Planned, coordinated and monitored the successful development and implementation of multiple projects for BU: Coordinated the Global P&L Renovation implementation. Minimized user and UAT effort during the life of the project. Lead the communications with multiple IT groups and managers through the development phases. Completed the documentation and outsourcing for 52 Prime Brokerage and for Fund Services procedures. Reengineered processes workflows. Outsourced 40% of finance reporting functions. Reduced headcount by 40%. Managed multiple projects for the Investment Banking Division, kept key metrics. Summarize results for CFO's. Guided stake holders to establish structure approach for managing projects.

PositionHistory.Title: Independent Consultant
PositionHistory.Description: Advised investors. Developed business plan for small business.

PositionHistory.Title: Consultant - Financial Services
PositionHistory.Description: Consultant - Financial Services Practice. Lead and participated on projects for CFO' clients at various companies including Bank of New York Mellon, Fortress Investments, ADP-Broadridge and CIT Bank. Led the design and implementation of US Commercial Bank subsidiary and new bank located in Mexico. Establish reporting and compliance function for Bank of New York in Mexico including BSA and AML. Managed finance corporate governance work stream for the successful integration of asset swap valued at 2.1 Billion. Business included CDO, MBS and Trust located in 45 international locations and legal entities. Obtained regulatory approvals. Prepared consolidated 5 year financials for FRB and Foreign regulators. Identified each BS Account owner (SOX compliance). Prepared Trading / Derivative regulatory schedules. Compiled data and prepared the first submission of FRY -9C quarterly report for Bank Holding Company. Created a database for key terms, covenants and price triggers on complex partnership agreements for Private Equity. Completed and documented reconciliation of all active deals and structured transactions to GL and records. Designed and implemented a client profitability model for security services clearing and processing.

PositionHistory.Title: Global Director of Financial Planning & Analysis
PositionHistory.Description: Managed USD380 Million capital expenditures annual budget for a leading education publicly traded company, evaluated business acquisitions. Prepared quarterly updates for investor relations. Designed and implemented a formal process for presenting, controlling and prioritizing CapEx spend. Developed standardized financial model format for review of acquisitions and growth projects. Trained finance and business at various locations in US, Europe and Latin America on CapEx process.

PositionHistory.Title: Business Manager VP
PositionHistory.Description: Led new initiatives for Clearing Services, Stock Lending, Equity Financing and Risk Management. Monitored IT's spend for multiple global trading platforms.

PositionHistory.Title: Global Manager, Corporate
PositionHistory.Description: Attained CEO/CFO's Comp & Non-comp expense reduction targets within a 12 month required period. Created reporting package in Oracle for communicating and measurement of relevant data across 4 major lines of business, core functions and support disciplines. Redesigned legal/ management chart of accounts and functional P&L.

PositionHistory.Title: CFO
PositionHistory.Description: CFO / CAO for ML's business in Mexico. Managed the activities of three business entities including top ranked licensed broker dealer with combined income in excess of USD100MM. Reduced Institutional Business fixed costs by 20%. Outsourced and extended employee services. Implemented best practices Risk Management Program for Licensed Broker Dealer. Removed VAT Tax contingency USD12 million. Increase trading volume with new transfer pricing strategy.

PositionHistory.Title: Latin America Regional Controller
PositionHistory.Description: Coordinated and reviewed monthly legal closings for the region. Established controls for new licensed broker dealers in Argentina, Brazil and in Mexico.

EmployerOrg.EmployerOrgName: Banco de Credito Nacional of Brazil

SchoolOrInstitution.Comments: NYS Licensed Agent for Life, Accident & Health. and for Property & Casualty

Competency.name: successful planning and implementation of strategic projects and tactical solutions
Global Director of Financial Planning & Analysis

CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Global Director of Financial Planning & Analysis

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sergio Rumayor has been working in the Banking-finance occupational sector for more than 23 years. Currently he is employed as an Engagement Partner at Tatum New. Sergio has an extensive management experience (18 years) with exposure to senior management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2011 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Program Manager/Compliance Officer at Morgan Stanley. Since 2005 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Global Director of Financial Planning & Analysis/Compliance Officer at Laureate Education Inc.. Since 2003 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Business Manager VP/Compliance Officer at Merrill Lynch. Since 2002 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Global Manager, Corporate/Compliance Officer at Merrill Lynch. Since 1998 for 48 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a CFO/Compliance Officer at Merrill Lynch. Since 1995 for 36 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Latin America Regional Controller/Compliance Officer at Merrill Lynch. Since 1994 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Controller/Compliance Officer at Banco de Credito Nacional of Brazil. Since 1989 for 60 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Controller/Compliance Officer at Banco Industrial de Venezuela.
